sentences.en: After dinner sit awhile, after supper walk a mile.
sentences.cn: 正餐以后,休息片刻;晚餐以后, 步行一里.

sentences.en: At supper, everyone was in high spirits.
sentences.cn: 晚餐时，每个人都兴致勃勃。

sentences.en: Come and have supper with us on Wednesday, if you're free.
sentences.cn: 如果你有空的话，周三晚上来和我们一起吃晚饭吧。

sentences.en: He was wont to fall asleep after supper.
sentences.cn: 他老是吃完晚饭就打盹。

sentences.en: I could cook your supper, though, if that would help.
sentences.cn: 不过我可以给你做晚饭，如果这样能帮到你的话。

sentences.en: I'll do my homework after supper.
sentences.cn: 晚饭后我要做家庭作业。

sentences.en: Michael was exiled to the kitchen for supper.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔被赶到厨房吃晚饭。

sentences.en: She made supper from leftovers she had thrown together.
sentences.cn: 她用吃剩的食物拼凑成一顿晚饭.

sentences.en: The beef I had at supper was very delicious.
sentences.cn: 我晚餐吃的牛肉味道很好.

sentences.en: The cold remains of supper had congealed on the plate.
sentences.cn: 晚餐剩下的冷饭菜已经凝结在盘子上了。

sentences.en: the cruise lecturers are academics singing for their supper.
sentences.cn: 巡迴讲师是一些以演讲获取旅费的学者。

sentences.en: They had invited me to come to supper and stay the night.
sentences.cn: 他们邀请我去吃晚饭并住上一晚。

sentences.en: Try this tasty dish for supper with a crispy salad.
sentences.cn: 晚饭就着鲜脆的色拉尝尝这道佳肴。

sentences.en: We had supper in a small Italian place.
sentences.cn: 我们在一家意大利小餐馆吃了晚饭。

sentences.en: We indulged in an expensive supper after the concert.
sentences.cn: 音乐会后我们尽情地享受了一顿昂贵的晚餐.

sentences.en: Why don’t you come over for supper on Friday?
sentences.cn: 周五为什么不过来吃晚饭呢？

sentences.en: You'll have to hustle if you're to get home for supper.
sentences.cn: 你想赶回家吃晚饭的话，就得加快速度。

words.tran_cn: 未吃晚饭的；没有晚饭的

phrases.tran_cn: 通过提供服务赢得帮助或好处

trans.tran_en: the meal that you have in the early evening
